170a1: ba de ni gnas ma mchis so/ / de nas srin mo de dag gis sgra skad gcig tshig 'thun par bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// gang gis gsang sngags 'di thos nas// chos snga
170a2: ba dang 'gal bgyid pa/ / nga'i mgo tshal ba bdun du 'gas// ardza ka yi dog pa bzhin// gang zhig chos smra 'gal bgyid pa// ma bsad pa yi 'gro gang dang // pha bsad 'gro ba gang lags pa'i// 'gro ba de ni der
170a3: mchi'o/ / gang zhig chos smra 'gal bgyid pa// tel 'tshir dag gi 'gro gang dang // til rdung 'gro ba gang lags pa'i// 'gro ba der ni de mchi'o// gang zhig chos smra 'gal bgyid pa// srang la g.yo bgyid 'gro
170a4: gang dang / / ze 'chos 'gro ba gang lags pa'i// 'gro ba der ni de 'chi'o// de skad ces gsol nas/ mdud can la sogs pa srin mo de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
170a5: bdag cag gis kyang chos smra ba 'di lta bu de dag bsrung bar bgyi'o/ / bde legs su 'gyur ba dang chad pa spang ba dang dug gzhil bar bgyi'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis srin mo de dag
170a6: la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / kye'i srin mo dag legs so legs so// khyed kyis chos smra ba de dag la bsrung ba dang sgrub pa dang srab gyis shig/ gang dag tha na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming tsam 'dzin
170a7: pa de dag la yang / mdud can khyod 'khor dang bcas pas bsrung bar bya na// gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mtha' dag chub par 'dzin pa dang glegs bam du byas te/ rim gro byed pa dang me tog dang badrag pa
170a8: d ang spos dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang na bza' dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang lha'i ba dan dang 'bru mar gyi mar me'am mar gyi mar me 'am spos mar gyi mar me'am tsam pa ka'i mar gyi
170b1: mang ma'am par sha ka'i mar gyi mar ma'am ud pa la'i mar gyi mar pa'am snga mu'i mar gyi mar ma'am/ de la bu'i mchod pa'i yo byad rnam pa mang po brgya skyong gis rim gro byed pa lta ci smos te/ mdud can khyod
170b2: g.yog dang bcas pas bsrung bar bya'o/ / gzungs sngags kyi le'u 'di bshad pa na srog chags drug khri brgyad stong mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po las/ gzungs
170b3: sngags kyi le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun du rgyas pa mngon par shes pas 'di skad
170b4: ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi rgyal po 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na rgyu ba dang / bcom ldan 'das 'di dka' ba bgyid pa bye ba khrag
170b5: khrig brgya stong mang po dag gda'/ bcom ldan 'das gang thos pas lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams dang
170b6: 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan nas lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / nyan thos chen po 'di dag gis thos nas thams cad dga' mgu rangs shing yid bde bar 'gyur
170b7: b a byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi rgyal po'i spyod pa gang ci lags pa'i phyogs tsam zhig de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis legs
170b8: bar bshad du gsol/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun du rgyas pa mngon par shes pas gsol ba btab pa mkhyen nas/
171a1: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na
171a2: bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed tu gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa/
171a3: 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyi zla dri ma med pa'i 'od dpal zhes bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung ste/
171a4: skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun du rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla dri ma med pa'i 'od dpa la de'i/ byang chub sems
171a5: dpa' bye ba brgyad bcu'i 'dus pa chen po byung ngo / / gang gA'i klung bdun bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi nyan thos 'dus pa byung ngo // de'i bstan pa la bud med med par gyur to// sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro'i skye
171a6: gnas dang yi dgas dang lha ma yin gyi ris med do/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang lag mthil ltar mnyam la nyams dga' bar gyur to// lha'i bai dUr+ya las grub pa'i sa phyogs rin po che dang tsan dan gyi shing ljon pas rgyan//
171a7: zhing / rin po che'i dra bas bres pa dar gyi lda ldi mngon par rab tu spangs pa rin po che'i pog por na sa bdug pas bdugs pa rin po che'i shing ljon pa'i drung thams cad na rin po che'i mkha' rten mda' rgyang gang gi chad
171a8: tsam byas pa yod pa/ rin po che'i mkha' rten thams cad kyi steng na lha'i bu bye ba brgyad dag/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla dri ma med pa'i 'od dpal/
171b1: la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ sil snyan byed cing pheg rdob pa dang / rol ma'i sgra 'byin cing 'khod do// bcom ldan 'das de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga'
171b2: ba la brtsams te/ dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di/ nyan thos chen po de dag dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la rgyas par rab tu ston to// skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun
171b3: du rgyas pa mngon par shes pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla dri ma med pa'i 'od dpal de'i tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa bzhi khri nyis stong du gyur te/ / byang
171b4: chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang nyan thos chen po de dag gi tshe'i tshad gyad de tsam du gyur to/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba de
171b5: yang / bcom ldan 'das de'i gsung rab la dka' ba byed pa la brtson par gyur te/ de lo khri nyis stong du 'chag pa la zhugs shing brtson 'grus chen po brtsams pa rnal 'byor la brtson par gyur to// de lo khri nyis
171b6: stong 'das nas gzugs thams cad yang dag par ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob te/ ting nge 'dzin de thob ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong
171b7: na dga' ba de tshim zhing mgu ste yid rangs nas rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas de'i tshe 'di snyam du sems te/ dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la brten nas
171b8: gzugs thams cad yang dag par ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin bdag gi thob bo snyam mo/ / de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba yang 'di snyam du sems
172a1: te/ 'di ltar bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla dri ma med pa'i 'od dpal dang dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mchod par
172a2: bya'o snyam nas/ de'i tshe de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs mtha'
172a3: de'i mod la steng gi bar snang las me tog man dA ra dang man dAr chen po'i lha'i me tog gi char chen po mngon par bab bo/ / dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i tsan dan gyis sprin byas te/ tsan dan sbal gyi snying po'i char
172a4: mngon par bab te/ skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun du rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ de lta bu'i spos kyi rnam pa zho gnyis kyi rin du 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dis mchog go/ skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas
172a5: pa mngon par shes pa/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du ting nge 'dzin de las langs so// langs nas 'di snyam du
172a6: sems te ci ltar lus yongs su btang ba ltar ni rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas pa ma yin no snyam mo// skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun du rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ de nas
172a7: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba de de'i tshe/ a ga ru dang du rus ka dang pog gi khu ba za zhing tsam pa ka'i mar yang 'thung ngo // skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun
172a8: nga rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ rnam grangs 'dis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba/ rtag tu spos bzhing sa pa ka'i mar 'thung bas lo bcu gnyis 'das
172b1: bar gyur to/ / skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun du rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba/ lo bcu gnyis po de 'das nas rang gi lus
172b2: lha'i ras kyis kun dkris nas 'bru mar gyis zhen par byas te bdag gi byin gyis brlabs byas so/ / bdag gis byin gyi brlabs byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam
172b3: grangs 'di mchod pa'i las kyi phyir bdag gi lus la me 'bar bar byas so/ / skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun du rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can
172b4: thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba'i lus kyi mar me 'bar ba de'i 'od kyi/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung brgyad bcu'i bye ma snyed khyab par gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
172b5: gang gA'i klung brgyad bcu'i bye ma snyed thams cad kyis legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi brtson 'grus rtsom pa
172b6: yang dag pa'o/ / 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang chos la mchod pa yang dag pa ste/ me tog dang bdug pa dang spos dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang na bza' dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang lha'i ba
172b7: dan gyis mchod pa dang zang zing gis mchod pa dang tsan dan sbrul gyi snying pos mchod pa ni de lta ma yin no/ / rigs kyi bu sbyin pa 'di ni mchog ste/ rgyal srid yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa ni de lta ma yin no//
172b8: bu dang chung ma phangs pa yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa yang de lta ma yin no// rigs kyi bu gang bdag gi lus gtong ba'i chos kyi mchod pa 'di ni mchod pa khyad par can no// dam pa'o// mchog go/ phul lo//
173a1: gya rnam pa'o// skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun du rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis tshig de skad ces gsungs nas de nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to// skar ma'i
173a2: rgyal po me tog kun du rgyas pa mngon par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba'i lus la 'bar ba lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du zhi bar ma song ngo / / de
173a3: byis lo bcu gnyis 'das nas zhi bar gyur to/ / skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba des/
173a4: de bzhin gshegs pa la 'di lta bu'i mchod pa dang chos kyi mchod pa byas te/ de nas shi 'phos nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pangs ma rgyas ni dris me ba'i 'od dpal
173a5: gyi gsung rab la rgyal po drim med pas byin pa'i khyim du skyes te dkyil mo dkrung bcas bzhin du bde bar rdzus te byung bar gyur to/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong
173a6: na dga' ba skyes ma thag tu/ de'i tshe rang gi pa ma la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ rgyal mchog 'di na bdag 'chag cing // der gnas bdag gi ting 'dzin thob// bdag gi lus padas yongs btang ste// brtson 'grus
173a7: sra brtsams btul zhugs che/ / skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun du rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba'i tshigs
173a8: su bcad pa de smras nas/ rang gi pha ma la 'di skad ces/ yab yum bcom ldan 'das gang la bdag gis mchod nas/ sgra thams cad la mkhas pa'i gzungs thob cing / dam pa'i tshes pad ma dkar po'i
173b1: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang tshigs su bcad pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gtams pa dang / dkrigs pa dang mi 'khrugs pa phrag brgyad bcus/ bcom ldan 'das de las thos par gyur pa'i bcom
173b2: ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla dri ma med bI 'od dpal de de ltar yang bzhugs te 'tsho gzhes kyis/ yab yum bcom ldan 'das de'i drung du
173b3: mchis na legs so/ / der mchis nas yang bcom ldan 'das de la mchod pa bgyi'o zhes smras so// skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
173b4: chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba de'i tshe/ nam mkha' la shing tal bdun tsam du mngon par 'phags te/ rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs par dkyil mo dkrung bcas nas bcom ldan
173b5: 'das de'i drung du song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das de la lan bdun bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar
173b6: ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te tshigs su bcad pa 'dis mngon par bstod do// dpa' bo mi dbang shin tu dri med zhal// phyogs bcu 'dir ni khyod kyi sa 'od zer mdzes// bde gshegs
173b7: khyod la bdag gis mchod mchog bgyis/ / mgon po lta ba'i slad du bdag 'dir mchis// skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun du rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
173b8: chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' bas tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
174a1: nyi zla dri ma med pa'i 'od dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das khyod da dung bzhugs sam/ skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun du rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
174a2: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla dri ma med pa'i 'od dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na
174a3: dga' ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / rigs kyi bu nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i dus la bab ste/ rigs kyi bu ra tshe zad pa'i dus la bab kyis/ rigs kyi bu khyod song la/ nga'i khri shoms shig dang /
174a4: nga yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o// skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun du rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla dri ma
174a5: med pa'i 'od dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu bstan pa 'di ngas khyod la yongasu gtad do// /
174a6: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag dang / nyan thos chen po 'di dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 'di dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag dang / rin po che'i mkha' rten 'di dag dang //
174a7: rin po che'i shing ljon pa 'di dag dang / nga'i bsnyen bkur byed pa'i lha'i bu 'di rnams kyang yongs su gtad do// rigs kyi bu nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i ring bsrel gang yin pa de dag kyang yongs su
174a8: gtang ngo / / rigs kyi bu nga'i ring bsrel la khyod bdag gis kyang khyed mchod pa rgya cher gyis shig/ ring bsre la de dag kyang rgyas par gyis shig/ mchod rten stong phrag mang po gyis shig/ skar ma'i
174b1: rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla dri ma med pa'i 'od dpal gyis
174b2: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba de la de ltar rjes su bstan nas/ de'i nub mo nam gyi cha smad la phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las
174b3: 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ / skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun du rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong nadag
174b4: bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla dri ma med pa'i 'od dpal de yongs su mya ngan las 'das par rig ste/ tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po spungs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsregs te/ de bzhin
174b5: gshegs pa'i sku tshig ba zhi bar rig nas ring bsrel bsdus te/ ngu zhing tshe nges btab nas smre sngags 'don to// skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun du rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
174b6: chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba dus te cho nges btab nas smre sngags 'don to/ / rin po che sna bdun gyi bum pa brgyad khri bzhi stong byed du bcug nas/ de dag gi nang du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring
174b7: bsrel bcug ste/ rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten 'phang du tshangs pa'i 'jig rten la thug pa/ gdugs kyi phreng bas legs par brgyan pa dang dang dril bu legs par sbyangs pa brgyad khri bzhi stong byas te/ des mtshod
174b8: rten de dag byas nas 'di snyam du bsems te/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das nyi zla dri ma med pa'i 'od dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung la mchod pa ni byas na/ de bas kyang lhag pa ches khyad par du 'phags
175a1: pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring srel la mchod pa bya'o snyam mo/ / skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis
175a2: mthong na dga' ba des/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs de dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / lha dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye
175a3: chen po dang mi dang mi ma yin pa'i tshogs de dag la smras pa/ rigs kyi bu dag khyed thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de'i ring bsrel rnams la mchod pa bya bar soms shig/ skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa
175a4: mngon par shes pa/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba des/ de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten brgyad khri bzhi stong gi mdun du rang gi lag pa
175a5: bsod nams brgyas brgyan pa 'bar bar byas te/ 'bar bar byas pas lo bdun khri nyis stong gi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de dag la mchod pa byas so// des mchod parade byas pas 'khor de las nyan
175a6: thos grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong btul to/ / byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis kyang gzugs thams cad yang dag par ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to// skar ma'i rgyal po me tog tu rgyas pa
175a7: mngon par shes pa/ de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs de dang / nyan thos chen po de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba
175a8: nga yan lag mtshang bar mthong nas ngus te tshe des btab nas smre sngags 'don cing gcig la gcig 'di skad smras te/ bdag cag gi slob dpon rjes su ston pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can
175b1: thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba 'di da ltar yan lag ma tshang zhing lag pa med par gyur to zhes zer ro/ / skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu brgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
175b2: dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang nyan thos de dag dang lha'i bude dag la smras pa/ rigs kyi bu dag kho ba'i yan laganyams
175b3: par mthong bas ma du shig/ chonges ma 'debs shig/ sgra sngags ma 'don cig/ rigs kyi bu dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs
175b4: shing 'tsho zhing bzhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kho bos dbang du bzhugs te/ de dag gi spyan sngar bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs so// bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis bdag gi lag
175b5: pa de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i phyir yongasu btang bas/ bdag gi lus gser gyi kha dog tu 'gyur ba'i bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des/ bdag gi lag pa 'di sngon gyi bzhin du gyur cig/ sa chen po 'di lan
175b6: drug tu g.yos par gyur cig/ bar snang la gnas pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis me tog gi char chen po phob shig ces byas so// skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ de nas byang chub sems
175b7: dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba des/ bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs de byas ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so//
175b8: stang gi bar snang las kyang me tog gi char chen po mngon par bab bo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba de'i lag pa de yang / 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa'
176a1: sems dpa' chen po de nyid kyi bsod nams kyi stobs bskyed pa dang / ye shes kyi stobs bskyed pa des sngon gyi bzhin du gyur to// skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun ta rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ de'i tshe dang/
176a2: dus na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba zhes bya bar gyur pa gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod som nyi 'am yid gnyis sam the tshom za bar gyur na/ skar ma'i
176a3: rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi rgyal po
176a4: 'di nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba zhes bya bar gyur to// skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ byang chub
176a5: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi rgyal po bya dka' ba bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong de snyed byed do lus yongs stong pa yang byed do/ / skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun du rgyas pa mngon par shes pa rigs kyi bu'am
176a6: rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di 'dod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de dag la rkang pa'i mthe 'bar bar
176a7: bya'o/ / lag pa'i sor mo'am rkang pa'i sor mo gcig gam yan lag gcig gam lag pa 'bar bar bya'o// byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni bsod nams mang/
176a8: bar 'du byed pa ches mang du skyed do// rgyal srid yongs su btang bas ni de lta ma yin no// chung ma dang bu pho dang bu mo phangs pa yongasu btang bas ni de lta ma yin no// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
176b1: khams na nags chal dang bcas pa rgya mtsho dang bcas pa ri dang bcas pa 'bab cu'i ngos dang mtsho dang mche'u dang khron pa dang kun dga'ar ba dang bcas pa yongs su btang bas ni lta ma yin na/ / skar ma'i rgyal
176b2: po ma tog kun rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen pa'i 'jig tan gyi khams 'di na po
176b3: sna bdun gyis rab tu gang bar byas te/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad la sbyin pa byin na/ skar ma'i rgyal ba ma tog kun du rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ rigs
176b4: kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las/ tha na tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam 'dzin pa de/ bsod
176b5: nams ji snyed cig spyad pa de skad du mi skyed de/ de'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa 'di ni de bas ches mang bar bshad kyi/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig tan gyi khams 'di rin po che sna bdun gyis rab
176b6: tu gang bar byas te/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad la sbyin pa byin pa ni de lta ma yin no// skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun du rgyas pa mngon par shes pa 'di lta ste/
176b7: dper na/ 'bab chu'i ngos dang mtsho dang mche'u thams cad kyi nang na rgya mtsho nani mchog tu gyur pa yin no// skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun du rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas bshad
176b8: pa'i mdo sde thams cad kyi nang na/ dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mchog tu gyur pa yin no// skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun du rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ 'di lta ste dper na ri nag
177a1: po dang / / khor yug dang khor yug chen po thams cad kyi nang na/ ri rab ri ni ri'i rgyal po ste mchog tu gyur pa yin no// skad ma'i rgyal po me tog kun du rgyas pa mngon par shes par bzhin du/
177a2: bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde thams cad kyi nang na/ dam pa'i chos pa ma pa/ po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rgyal po skye mdzag/ tu gyur pa yin no// skar ma'i rgyal po ma tog kun du rdzas
177a3: pa mngon par shes pa/ 'di lta ste dper na skar ma thams cad kyi nang na zla ba ni 'od byed pa'i mchog tu gyur pa yin no// skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun du rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ de bzhin du
177a4: de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde thams cad kyi nang na/ dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni zlab bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong pas lhag par 'od byed pa'i mchog tu
177a5: gyur pa yin no/ / skad ma'i rgyal po me tog kun du rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ 'di lta ste dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni mun pa mun gnag thams cad sel bar byed do// sang ma'i rgyal po me tog kun N+Da
177a6: pa mngon par shes pa/ de bzhin du dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang mi dge ba'i mun pa mun gnag thams cad sel bar byed do// skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par
177a7: shes pa 'di lta ste dper na/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang na brgya byin ni lha rnams kyi dbang po yin no// skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon pa shes pa/ de bzhin du dam pa'i chos pad mdaka
177a8: po chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde thams cad kyi nang na dbang po yin no/ / skad ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa 'di lta ste dper na/ mi mjed kyi bdag sa
177b1: tshangs pa ni tshangs ris kyi lha thams cad kyi rgyal po sna tshangs pa'i 'jig rten na pa'i bya ba byed do/ / skar ma'i rgyal po ma tog kun du rgyas pa mngon par shes pa// de bzhin du dam pa'i chos pad pa da/ par kya
177b2: rnam grangs 'di yang sems can slob pa dang mi slob pa thams cad dang nyan thos dang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa thams cad la pa'i bya ba byed do/ / skad ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tuH
177b3: pa mngon par shes pa 'di lta ste dper na/ rgyun tu zhugs pa dang lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang phyir mi 'ong ba dang dgra bcom pa dang rang sangs rgyas rnams ni byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad las 'das pa'o// skur
177b4: ma'i rgyal po me tog kun du rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ de bzhin du dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa gsungs pa'i mdo sde thams cad las 'das shing
177b5: mngon par 'phags te/ mchog tu gyur par rig par bya'o// skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun du rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ gang dag mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa de dag kyang sems can thams cad kyi gotso bor
177b6: grung par rig par bya'o/ / skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun du rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ 'di lta ste dper na/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi nang na byang chub sems dpa' ni mchog ces bya'o// skar ma'i
177b7: rgyal po 'i tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ de bzhin du/ dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde thams cad kyi mchog cer
177b8: kang ra'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ 'di lta ste dper na/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi nang na de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi rgyal por
178a1: thabs gsol pa yin no/ / skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun du rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ de bzhin du dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang /
178a2: dag par zhugs pa rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra ba yin no// skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni sems can
178a3: thams cad 'jigs pa thams cad las skyob pa/ sdug bsngal thams cad las thar bar byed pa ste/ skom pa rnams la mtshe'u dang 'dra'o// grang bas nyen pa rnams la me dang 'dra'o// gcer bu rnams la gos
178a4: dang 'dra'o/ / tshed pa rnams la de dang pon dang 'dra'o// bu rnams la ma dang 'dra'o// pha rol tu 'gro ba rnams la gru dang 'dra'o// nad pa rnams la sman pa dang 'dra'o// mun pa mun gnag gis bsgribs pa rnams la mar me dang
178a5: 'dra'o/ / nor 'dong pa rnams la rin po che dang 'dra'o// khams kyi rgyal po thams cad la 'khor los sgyur ba dang 'dra'o// 'bab chu rnams la rgya mtsho dang 'dra'o// mun pa mun gnag thams cad sel ba'i phyir sgron
178a6: ma dang 'dra'o/ / skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun du rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ de bzhin du dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang sdug bsngal thams cad las rab tu thar bar byed pa'o//
178a7: nad thams cad gcod pa'o// 'khor ba'i bcing ba nyam nga ba thams cad las rab tu thar par byed pa'o// skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun du rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ gang gis dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi
178a8: rnam grangs 'di thos pa dang gang yi ger 'dri ba dang gang yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang / skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun du rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ gang gi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung ngam ston tam thos sam yi
178b1: b yas sam sa gar 'drar 'dug gas grags pas du byas tas snang du byag dang btsun par byed pa dang bzang steng byed pa dang mchod pa dang matog dang bdug pa dang sus dang brang ba dang byug pa dang bya ma dgos
178b2: dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang bdan dang / rol mo'i sgra dang na bza' dang thal mo sbyar ba'i las dang mar gyi mar ma'am 'bru mar gyi mar me'am gros mar gyi mar ma' ba tsam pa ka'i mar gyi ma ma'am/ sA
178b3: d ang skya nar dang par sha ka dang na pa ma li ka'i mar gyi mar me'am mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis sti stang du byed btsun par byed rim gror byed mchod par byed pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa ji skad ces
178b4: 'phel bar 'gyur ba'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa de dag gi mtha' ni/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis kyang rtogs par mi nus so// skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun du rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ gang zhig
178b5: sman gyi rgyal po'i sngon gyi sbyor ba'i le'u 'di 'dzin pa dang ston pa dang nyan pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa de bsod nams mang du skyed par 'gyu'o/ /
178b6: gal te bud med gcig gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas 'din na/ de nyid bud med kyi lus kyi mtha' mar 'gyur ro// skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun du rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ bud med gang la la/
178b7: sman gyi rgyal po'i sngon gyi sbyor ba'i le'u 'di lnga brgya pa tha ma la thos nas nan tan byed pa da/ 'di nas shi 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te/ gang na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gsheg
178b8: pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tsha dpag med/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes pa der/ depad ma'i seng ge'i dri la 'dug bzhi dang
179a1: skye bar 'gyur ro/ / de 'dod chags kyis gzir bar mi 'gyur ro// zhe sdang gis ma yin gti mug gis ma yin nga rgyal gyis ma yin ser snas ma yin khro bas ma yin gnod sems kyis ma yin te//
179a2: de skyes ma thag tu mngon par shes pa lnga thob par 'gyur ro// mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa 'ang thob par 'gyur ro// skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun du rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ byang chub sems dpa'
179a3: sems dpa' chen po des/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i klung bdun bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed mthong bar 'gyur ro// mig gi dbang po yongs su dag pa gang gis sangs rgyas
179a4: bcom ldan 'das de dag mthong bar 'gyur ba de 'dra bar mig gi dbang po yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang de la legs so zhes bya ba sbyin par 'gyur te/ gang khyod kyis
179a5: dam pa'i chos pad ma dgar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de'i gsung rab la lung mnos pa dang
179a6: kha don byas pa dang bsgom pa dang bsams pa dang yid la byas pa dang sems can gzhan dag la yang rab tu bstan pa/ rigs kyi bu legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyi bsod nams mngon par 'du
179a7: byed pa 'di ni mes tshig pa 'am chus khyer bar mi nus so/ / rigs kyi bu khyod kyi bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa 'di ni sangs rgyas brgyad stong gis kyang bshad par mi nus so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bdud
179a8: phyir rgol ba btsem mo/ / srid pa'i rgya mtsho las rgal to// dgra'i tsher ma dkrugs so// sangs rgyas stong gis byin gyis brlabs so// rigs kyi bu lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na khyod 'dra ba med do// de bzhin
179b1: gshegs pa gcig bu ma gtogs par gzhan nyan thos sam rang sangs rgyas sam byang chub sems dpa' gang gis kyang / khyod la bsod nams kyis kyang / rung ye shes kyis kyang rung shes rab kyis kyang rung
179b2: ting nge 'dzin gyis kyang rung ste zil gyis gnon par mi nus so/ / sar ma'i rgyal ba ma tog kun du rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa de la shI gyi stabs bskyed pa 'di
179b3: bu thob par 'gyur ro/ / skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun du rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ gang la las sman gyi rgyal po'i sngon gyi sbyor ba'i le'u 'di bshad pa zos nas/ legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin pa des
179b4: kha nas ud pa la'i dri 'byung bar 'gyur/ / de'i lus las kyang tsan dan gyi dri 'byung bar 'gyuro// gang gis chos kyi nam grangs 'di 'chang ban legs so zhes bya ba byin pa de'i chos can gyi yon tan gyi zan
179b5: yon de dag ni/ ngas da ltar gang dag bshad pa de 'dra bar 'gyur ro// skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun du rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams
179b6: cad kyis mthong na dga' ba'i sngon gyi sbyor ba'i le'u 'di ci nas/ phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la 'dzam bu'i gling 'di na spyod cing nub par mi 'gyur ba dang / bdud sdig can gyis glags mi rnyed
179b7: ba dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang grul bum rnams kyis glags mi rnyed par bya ba'i phyir ngas khyod la yongs su gtad do/ / skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun du rgyas pa mngon
179b8: ba shes pa/ de lta bas na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir sems can nad pa nad kyis btab pa rnams la sman lta bur 'gyur bar byin gyis brlab par byas te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
180a1: thos nas lus land kyis ma thugs/ nabs ma yin// das ma yin par 'chibs ma yin no// sar ma'i rgyal ba me tog kun du rgyas pa mngon pa shes pa/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' thag pa
180a2: yang dag par zhugs pa gang la las/ mdo sde 'di lta bu 'dzin pa'i dge slong de lta bu de mthong na/ de la tsan dan gyi phye ma dang ud pa la sngon pos mngon par gtor bar bya'o// mngon par gtor nas kyang 'ang
180a3: snyam du rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar 'gyur/ 'di ni na len par 'gyur/ 'di ni byang chub kyi snying por na 'ding bar 'gyur/ 'di ni bdud kyi phyogs pham par byed par 'gyur/ 'di na
180a4: chos kyi dung 'bud par 'gyur/ 'di ni chos kyi rnga rdung bar 'gyur/ 'di ni 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho rgal bar 'gyur ro snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o// skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun du rgyas pa mngon par
180a5: shes pa rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa/ mdo sde 'di lta bu 'dzin pa'i dge slong mthong nas de ltar sems bskyed par byas te/ de ltar na de'i
180a6: yon tan dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas ci 'dra ba dag bshad pa de 'dra ba dag tu 'gyur ro/ / sman gyi rgyal po'i sngon gyi sbyor ba'i le'u 'di bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri bzhi stong gis/
180a7: thams cad la mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i gzungs thob par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mang nges kyang / skar ma'i rgyal po mato//
180a8: kun du rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ de ltar khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yon tan gyi chos dris pa legs so legs so zhes legs so zhes bya ba byin no// sman gyi rgyal po
180b1: sngon gyi sbyor ba'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas de'i tshe/ skyes bu chen
180b2: po'i mtshan smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od phyung ste/ 'od des shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gang gA'i klung bcwa brgyad kyi bye ma snyed dag khyab par byas so// sangs
180b3: r gyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gang gA'i klung bcwa brgyad kyi bye ma de dag 'das pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang ba'i 'od zer gyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
180b4: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma'i 'dab ma dri ma med pa skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes la/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun rgya chen po tshad med
180b5: pas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa des mdzod spu nas 'od gang
180b6: btang ba des/ de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang ba'i 'od zer gyis brgyan pa de snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang ba'i 'od zer gyi sa brgyan pa de na/ byang chub sems
180b7: dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs zhes bya ba dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ sngon yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mang po'i 'od zer de lta bu mthong
180b8: shang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs kyis ting nge 'dzin mang po thob pa 'di lta ste/ rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin thob/ dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i
181a1: tangangange 'dzin thab/ dri ma med pas byin pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob/ skad ma'i rgyal po rnam par rag pa'i ting nge 'dzin thab/ rlung lta ba'i ting nga 'don thob/ lags kyi phyag rgya ting 'dzid
181a2: thog zla ba sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin thob/ sgra thams cad la 'khas pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob/ bsod nams thams cad kun las bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin thog dad pa can gyi ting nge 'dzin thob rdzu 'phrul
181a3: rnam par rol pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob/ ye shes ta la la'i ting nge 'dzin thob/ bkod pa'i rgyal po'i ting nge 'dzin thob/ dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin thob/ dri ma med pa'i snying po'i ting nge 'dzin thos/
181a4: zad par chu'i ting nge 'dzin thob/ nyi ma 'khor ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob/ de bzhin du sbyar te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs kyis/ ting nge 'dzin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
181a5: phrag gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bar du thob par 'dug ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs de'i lus la 'od des phog par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
181a6: gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma'i 'dab ma dri ma med pa skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun du rgyas pa la/ byang chub sems dpa' sem ma dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs kyis
181a7: 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la blta ba dang phyag bgyi ba dang bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang 'dam pas/
181a8: gzhon nur gyur pa de yang blta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi rgyal po de yang blta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rab tu sbyin pa de yang blta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun du rgyas pa mngon
181b1: par shes pa de yang blta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa khyad par can de yang blta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' bkod pa'i rgyal po de yang blta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sman yang dga' phags de yang blta ba'i
181b2: slad du/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du mchi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma'i 'dab ma dri ma med pa skar ma'i rgyal po me tog
181b3: kun du rgyas pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa nga sang po'i dbyangs la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der song ste byin nas/ ngan pa'i 'du shes bskyed
181b4: par mi bya'o/ / rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed de ni mthon dman can dang sa las grub pa dang ri nag pos gang ba dang 'jim ngan gyis yongs su gang ba'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
181b5: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de yang skra thung ngo / / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang lus thung ngo // rigs kyi bu khyod kyi lus thob pa ni dpag tshad bzhi khri nyos stong ngo // rigs kyi
181b6: nga'i lus ni dpag tshad 'bum phrag drug bcu rtsa brgyad yod do/ / rigs kyi bu khyod ni mdzes pa blta na sdug pa gzugs bzang ba kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/ bsod nams brgya stong pas shin du lhag pa'i
181b7: dpal dang ldan pa'o/ / rigs kyi bu da lta bas na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du phyin nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de la ngan pa'i 'du shes ma skyed cig/
181b8: de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sad sad po'i dbyangs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pa ma'i 'dab ma
182a1: dri ma med pa skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs skyed pa dang / de bzhin
182a2: gshegs pa'i rnam par rol pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bkod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mngon par 'phags pa'i ye shes kyis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der mchi'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
182a3: sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs kyis/ de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas ma g.yos shing / stan de las ma langs par 'di lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
182a4: bo sad sang po'i dbyangs de ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de'i modado la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed tu/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi gdan gyi drung du// pad ma chub ni gser/
182a5: 'dab ma ni dngul/ snying po ni pad ma dang ne tse lam ci las grub pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi byung bar gyur to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ pad ma bkod pa byung ba de mthong nas/ bcom
182a6: ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar chub ni gser 'dab ma ni dngul snying po ni pad ma dang ne tse'am
182a7: ci las grub pa'i pad ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi gda' ba 'di su'i lnga ltas lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka'
182a8: stsal to/ / 'jam dpal 'di ni shar phyogs logs nas 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang ba'i 'od zer gyis brgyan pa nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
182b1: pad ma'i 'dab ma dri ma med pa sar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun du rgyas pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
182b2: gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ de la blta ba dang phyag bya ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba dang dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pi'i 'phyir/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ong ba dal/
182b3: snga ltas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu des dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs ci bgyis na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs bsags pa
182b4: des 'di lta bu'i khyad par 'di thob/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' de ting nge 'dzin gang la spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin de bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mnyan par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ting 'dzin
182b5: de la spyad par bgyi'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ci 'dra ba dang kha dog ci 'dra ba dang gzugs ci 'dra ba dang rtags ci 'dra ba dang dbyibs ci 'dra ba dang de'i spyod pa ci lags pa/ bdag gis byang chub sems
182b6: dpa' sems dpa' chen po de blta bar bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das brda ltas gang gis bskul ma thag tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir mchi bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i
182b7: brda ltas shig de bzhin gshegs pas legs par mdzad du gsol/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
182b8: bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa rin chen mang la 'di skad ces gsungs so/ / ci nas brda ltas gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sad sang po'i dbyangs
183a1: 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir mchi ba de lta bu'i brda ltas bcom ldan 'das kyis mdzod cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs
183a2: s u mya ngan las 'das pa rin chen mang gis de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sa sang po'i dbyangs bskul ba'i phyir 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di rigs kyi bu mthong bar dka' bas rigs
183a3: kyi bu khyod 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir sho ga cig ces de lta bu'i brda mdzad do/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sad sang po'i dbyangs kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
183a4: bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma'i 'dab ma dri ma med pa skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun du rgyas pa de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ byang chub sems dpa'
183a5: bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi po de dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang ba'i 'od zer gyis brgyan pa de nas mi snang bar 'gyur nas/ 'jig rten
183a6: gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te/ zhing dag ni dgu g.yo bar byed/ pad ma'i chang ni rab tu 'bebs/ sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ni len cing / mig ni ud pa la sngon po'i 'dab ma 'dra/ bzhin ni zab bya ba khrag theg
183a7: brgya stong pas lhag/ lus kyi mdog ni gser gyi kha dog 'dra la/ lus bsod nams brgya stong gis ni brgyan/ dpal gyis ni rab tu 'bar/ gzi brjid kyis ni shin du lhag ger gyur/ lus ni mtshan rnams kyis
183a8: rnam par spras/ lus sred med kyi bu'i lus ltar ni 'khregs pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs par zhugs te/ nam mkha' la ta la bdun tsam nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi sa yongs su bskor
183b1: cing mdun du bdar nas 'ongs te/ de 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di ga la ba dang bya rgod phung po'i rig la ba der 'ongs te phyin nas/ khang pa brtsegs pa de nas babs te/ brgya stong ri ba'i mu tig gi phreng ba thogs
183b2: shang/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba der song nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan bdun bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir mu tig ga phreng ba
183b3: phul lo/ / phul nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma'i 'dab ma dri ma med pa skar ma'i rgyal po me
183b4: tog kun du rgyas pa bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa nyung nga mnyam nga ba nyung ngam bskyod pa yang dam/ stobs dang bde bar gnas sam zhes snyun gsol lo// bcom ldan 'das de 'di skad ces kyang gsung ste/ bcom ldan
183b5: 'das khyod bzod dam gzhes sa ma khams rnams mthun nam khyod kyi sems can rnams go sla 'am gdul sra 'am gso sla 'am gtsang ma 'dod dam/ ha cang 'dod chags mi spyod dam ha cang zhe sdang mi spyod dam ta/
183b6: cang gti mug mi spyod dam bcom ldan 'das khyod kyi sems can dag shin du phrag dog can ma yin nam ser sna can ma yin nam mar mi 'dzin pa ma yin nam par mi 'dzin pa ma yin nam dge slong du mi 'dzin pa
183b7: ma yin nam bram zer mi 'dzin pa ma yin nam log par lta ba ma yin nam sems ma dul ba ma yin nam dbang po ma bsrung ba ma yin nam/ bcom ldan 'das khyod kyis sems can de dag gis bdud phyir rgol
183b8: ba bcom 'am/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gsheg pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa rin chen mad do// rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten gyi nang na bzhugs
184a1: pa chos gsan pa'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du gshegs sam/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mngal yang bcom ldan 'das de 'dri ba/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
184a2: gshegs pa rin chen mad de bzod dam gshegs sam/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mang ring du gzhes sam zhes gsung ngo // bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang / bcom ldan 'das
184a3: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mang de'i ring bsrel gyi sku blta bar bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
184a4: rgyas rin chen mad de'i ring bsrel gyi sku/ de bzhin gshegs pas legs par bstan du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa/
184a5: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa rin chen mad de la 'di skad ces gsungs so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
184a6: dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa dasang po'i dbyangs 'di/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa rin chen mang ma thob par
184a7: 'tshal nas mchis so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sad sang po'i
184a8: dbyangs la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / rigs kyi bu khyod de dang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa mthong bar 'dod pa dang / dam pa'i
184b1: chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa legs so legs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bad
184b2: ma'i dpal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sad sang po'i dbyangs kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa gang gi drung du sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta bu zhig bskrun/ de nas
184b3: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad ma'i dpal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / rigs kyi bu
184b4: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa mthong na dga' ba la/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzugs thams cad shin du ston par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su
184b5: ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sprin dang rnga sgra rgyal po zhes bya ba 'di 'jig rten du byung ste
184b6: rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin dang rnga sgra rgyal po de la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sad sang po'i dbyangs kyis sil snyan brgya stong rab tu blangs te/ lo khri nyis stong du mchod
184b7: ba byas so/ / rin po che sna bdun gyi snong brgyad khri bzhi stong yul lo// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa sprin dang rnga sgra rgyal po'i gsung rab de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sad sang po'i dbyangs
184b8: kyis de lta bu'i dad pa thob po/ / de'i cha de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin dang rnga sgra rgyal po la mchod pa byas shing snod brgyad khri bzhi stong
185a1: de dag phul ba de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod som nyi 'am yid gnyis sa mthe tshom za bar gyur na rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu gang gis bcom ldan 'das de
185a2: bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin dang rnga sgra rgyal po de la mchod pa byas pa dang / snod de dag kyang phul ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs pa
185a3: po'i dbyangs 'di nyid yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs de ni/ sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ sangs rgyas brgya stong mang po la dge ba'i rtsa ba
185a4: bskyed pa/ yongs su sbyang ba byas pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sad sang po'i dbyangs 'dis sngon yang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ngo // pad ma'i dpal
185a5: khyod kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs 'di mthong ngam/ pad ma'i dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so// bcom ldan
185a6: 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ pad ma'i dpal byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs 'di ni/ gzugs mang pos dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ston te/ 'di lta ste/
185a7: la lar ni tshangs pa'i gzugs kyis/ la lar ni rgya byin gyi gzugs kyis/ la lar ni dbang phyug gi gzugs kyis/ la lar ni dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs kyis/ la lar ni dmag dpon gyi gzugs kyis/
185a8: la lang ni mchog gi gzugs kyis/ la lar ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i gzugs kyis/ la lar ni khams kyi rgyal po'i gzugs kyis/ la lar ni tshong dpon gyi gzugs kyis// la lar ni khyim bdag gi gzugs kyis/
185b1: la lar ni grong mi'i gzugs kyis/ la lar ni bram ze'i gzugs kyis dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ston to// la lar ni dge slong gi gzugs kyis/ la lang ni dge slong ma'i gzugs kyis
185b2: la lar ni dge bsnyen gyi gzugs kyis/ la lar ni dge bsnyen ma'i gzugs kyis/ la lar ni tshong dpon gyi chung ma'i gzugs kyis/ la lar ni khyim bdag gi chung ma'i gzugs kyis/ la lar ni grong mi'i chung ma'i
185b3: gzugs kyis/ la lang ni khye'u'i gzugs kyis/ la lang ni bu mo'i gzugs kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sems
185b4: can rnams la ston te rigs kyi bu gzugs 'di snyed cig kun du ston pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sems can rnams
185b5: la ston to/ / kha cig la ni gnod sbyin gyi gzugs kyi bar gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs kyis// dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sems can rnams
185b6: la ston to/ / kha cig la lha ma yin gyi gzugs kyis/ kha cig la nam mkha' lding gi gzugs kyis/ kha cig la mi 'am ci'i gzugs kyis/ kha cig la lto 'phye chen po'i gzugs kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'
185b7: sems dpa' chen po sad sang po'i dbyangs/ dam pa'i chos pa dam dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sems can rnams la ston to// sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten
185b8: dang mi khom par skyes pa'i bar gyi sems can rnams la yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs skyob par 'gyur ro// btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na 'dug pa'i bar gyi sems can
186a1: rnams la yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sad sang po'i dbyangs bud med kyi gzugs su mngon par sprul te/ dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'jig rten gyi khams
186a2: mi mjed 'dir sems can rnams la chos ston to/ / pad ma'i dpal byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du skyes pa'i sems can rnams la skyob pa ste//
186a3: 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs 'di de snyed kyi gzugs su sprul pas/ dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sems can
186a4: rnams la ston te/ skyes bu dam pa 'di rdzu 'phrul yang nyams par med/ shes rab kyang nyams pa med do// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs ni ye shes kyi snang ba 'di snyed
186a5: kyis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na snang ngo / / 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na yang / byang chub sems dpas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la 'di byang chub sems dpa'i gzug
186a6: kyis chos ston to/ / nyan thos kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la nyan thos kyi gzugs kyis chos ston to// rang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la rang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyis chos ston to// de
186a7: bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyis chos ston to/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi bar gyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la de bzhin
186a8: gshegs pa'i ring srel ston to/ / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar gyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das par ston to// pad ma'i dpal de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sas
186b1: dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs ni ye shes kyi stobs bskyed pa thob po/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad ma'i dpal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
186b2: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa 'di/ bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sadabang po'i dbyangs kyis
186b3: sems can 'di snyed btul ba'i ting nge 'dzin de gang lags/ de skad ces gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas/ byang chub sems
186b4: dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad ma'i dpal la 'di skad ce bka' stsal to/ / rigs kyi bu ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po sad sang po'i yung kyis 'di ltar sems can dpag tu med
186b5: pa'i don byas pa ni/ gzugs thams cad yang dag par ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di yin no// sad sang po'i dbyangs kyi le'u 'di bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sad sang po'i
186b6: dbyangs dang lhan cig du/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir lhags pa de dag thams cad kyis gzugs thams cad yang dag par
186b7: smyon pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to/ / 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang pa las 'das pa de dag gis kyang / gzugs thams cad yang dag par
186b8: ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sad sang po'i dbyangs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
187a1: rgyas shAkya thub pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mang gi ring bsrel gyi mchod rten la yangs shing rgya che ba'i mchod pa byas nas/
187a2: ring ba cha lnga bdun gyi yang pa bcugs par zhugs te/ nga rnams ni rab krugaso par byed/ pad ma'i cher ne ba tu 'babs/ sil snyan bya ba khrag khrig btu stong na yin cing / byang chubs pas dpa' byab wag khrigs
187a3: stong phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhis yongs su bskor te mdun du bdar nas/ lhan cig tu slar rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
187a4: pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma'i 'dab ma dri ma med pa skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun du rgyas pa la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad du bdag gis sems can gyi don byas so// tsam
187a5: ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mang gi ring bsrel gyi mchod rten yang mthong phyag kyang bgyis so/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa yang
187a6: mthong ste phyag bgyis so/ / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de yang mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi rgyal po brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyi shugs thob pa de dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
187a7: dpa' chen po rab tu sbyin par yang mthong ngo / / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig bcu stong phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi po de dag thams cad kyis kyang / gzugs thams cad yang dag par spyon pa'i tingang 'din thob par
187a8: gyur to/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang seng po'i dbyangs 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'i le'u 'di bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' bzhi khri nyis stong gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// byang chub
187b1: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad ma'i dpal gyis kyang / dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to// sang sang po'i dbyangs kyi le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// #####/
187b2: dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po bam po bcu gsum pa ste tha ma'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi zad pa stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i
187b3: lha nga sa la gtsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs
187b4: kyi dbang phyug ci'i slad tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug ces bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi zad pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// /
187b5: rigs kyi bu 'di la sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ji snyed cig sdug bsngal gang dag myong bar gyur pa de dag gis/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ming thos
187b6: na/ de dag thams cad sdug bsngal gyi phung po de las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ming 'dzin pa de dag/ gal te me'i
187b7: phung po chen por ldang na yang / de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzi brjid kyis/ me'i phung po rab tu 'bar ba las thar par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gal te chu
187b8: klung gis khyer la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bos na/ chu klung de dag thams cad kyis sems can de dag thams cad gting tshugs par byed do// rigs kyi bu gal te
188a1: sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong rgya mtsho'i nang du grwar zhugs te/ 'gron bu dang gser dang nor bu dang mu tig dang bi dUr+ya dang dung dang man shel dang rdo'i snying po dang byi ru dang spug dang mu tig dmar po la sogs pa'i/
188a2: phyir dong ba de rnams/ rlung nag pos srin mo'i gling du 'phangs par gyur la/ de na sems can cig 'ga' zhig gis spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bos na/ de dag thams cad srin mo'i gling de nas thar bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi
188a3: bu de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ces btags so/ / rigs kyi bu gal te gsad par dkri pa las spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bos na/
188a4: gshed ma de dag gi mtshon de dag dum bu dum bur chag cing grugs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di gnod sbyin dang srin pos gang par gyur kyang / byang chub sems
188a5: dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ming 'dzin pa la/ de dag thams cad kyis sdang 'i sems kyis lta yang mi bod do// rigs kyi bu sems can la la lcags sgrogs dang / shing sgrog tu bcug
188a6: par gyur na nyes yod kyang rung nyes med kyang rung na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ming nas phyug pas/ lugs sgrog dang shing sgrog tu bcug pa dag gi bu ga bye bar
188a7: 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mthu ni de 'dra'o// rigs kyi bu gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di
188a8: g.yon can dang / chom rkun dang dgra lag na mtshon thogs pas sa gang bar gyur te/ der ded dpon gcig gis 'gron po mang po phal po che rin po ches phyug pa ded de dong pa las/ 'dod pa de dag gis g.yon/
188b1: can chom kun dang dag lag na mtshon thogs pa de dag mthong ste/ mthong nas kyang 'jigs shing skrag te/ bdag cag skyabs med par shes pa las/ der dpon des 'gron po mang po la 'di skad ces ma
188b2: 'jigs shig/ rigs kyi bu dag ma 'jigs shig mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la sgra skad gcig tu bos shig dang / des khyed chom rkun rtsa
188b3: 'jigs pa dang / dgra'i 'jigs pa 'di las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro zhes bsgol/ de nas 'gron po mang po thams cad kyi sgra skad gcig tu spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bos te/ 'jigs pa med pa'i sbyin pa byang
188b4: chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs de la phyag 'tshal lo phyag 'tshal lo zhes ming nas phyur ma thag tu/ 'gron po phal po che de dag thams cad 'jigs pa thams cad las yongs su thar par 'gyur
188b5: te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mthu ni de 'dra'o// rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag 'dod chags spyod pa de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ngas
188b6: gzigs dbang phyug la phyag byas na 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ / sems can gang dag zhe sdang spyod pa de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag byas na zhe sdang
188b7: dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ / sems can gang dag gti mug spyod pa de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag byas na gti mug dang bral bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de
188b8: ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ni rdzu 'phrul che ba'o/ / rigs kyi bu bud med bu po 'dod pa gang lal byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
189a1: la phyag 'tshal na de las bu pho 'byung ste/ gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa blta na sdug pa khye'u'i mtshan dang ldan pa/ skye bo mang po'i yid du 'ong zhing sdug pa dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'byung ngo // gang bu mo 'dod pa de yang
189a2: bu mo 'byung te/ gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa blta na sdug pa bu mo'i mtshan dang ldan pa/ skye bo mang po'i yid tu 'ong zhing sdug pa dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa 'byung ngo // rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
189a3: spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gi mthu ni de 'dra'o/ / gang dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal ba de dag don yod pa'i 'bras bur 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gang zhis
189a4: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal zhing ming 'dzin la/ gang zhig sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung drug bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed dag la phyag
189a5: 'tshal zhing ming 'dzin pa dang / yang gang zhig gre sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung drug bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes pa de dag la na bza' dang bsod snyoms dang gzims cha dang
189a6: snyun gyi gsos sman dang yo byad kyis mchod pa byed na/ rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa de tsam zhig skyed/ de skad ces bka' stsal nas/
189a7: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi bzad pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gzhi de las bsod nams skyed pa ni bcom ldan 'das mang
189a8: lags so/ / bde bar gshegs pa mang lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de snyed la bkur sti byas pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du
189b1: byed pa dang / gang gis tha na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug la phyag lan cig byas pa dang / ming 'dzin pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa gnyi ga mnyam ste/ lhag pa
189b2: yang med 'phags pa yang med do/ / gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung drug bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal zhing ming 'dzin pa dang / gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
189b3: spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal zhing ming 'dzin pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de gnyi ga bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du yang zad par bya ba sla ba ma yin no/ / rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
189b4: dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gi ming 'dzin pa'i bsod nams de ltar dpag tu med do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi zad pas 'di
189b5: skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na rnam par rgyu/ ji ltar sems can rnams la chos
189b6: ston/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gi thabs mkhas pa'i yul ni ci 'dra ba zhig lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems
189b7: dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi zad pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / rigs kyi bu gang dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyis sems
189b8: can rnams la chos ston pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag yod do/ / gang dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gzugs kyi
190a1: chos ston pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag kyang yod do/ / sems can bcig la ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ma gzigs kyi dbang phyug rang sangs rgyas kyi lugs kyi cho
190a2: ston to/ / kha cig la nyan thos kyi gzugs kyis// bcig la tshangs pa'i gzugs kyis/ kha cig la rgya byin gyi gzugs kyis/ sems can kha cig la ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan pa
190a3: gzigs kyi dbang phyug dri za'i gzugs kyis chos ston to/ / gnod sbyin gyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la ni gnod sbyin gyi gzugs kyis chos ston to// dbang phyug gis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams pa
190a4: ni dbang phyug gi gzugs kyis chos ston to/ / dbang phyug chen pos 'dul ba'i sems can rnam la ni dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs kyis chos ston to// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal pos 'dul ba'i sems can
190a5: rnams la ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i gzugs kyis chos ston to/ / sha zas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la ni sha za'i gzugs kyis chos ston to// mchog gis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la ni mchog gi
190a6: gzugs kyis chos ston to/ / dmag dpon gyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la ni dmag dpon gyi gzugs kyis chos ston to// bram zes 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la ni bram ze'i gzugs kyis chos ston
190a7: to/ / lag na rdo rjes 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la ni lag na rdo rje'i gzugs kyis chos ston to// rigs kyi bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug yon tan bsam
190a8: gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan no/ / rigs kyi bu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug la mchod cig/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan
190b1: ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug 'di 'jigs pa'i sems can rnams la mi 'jigs pa skyid pa ste/ de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'din mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa zhes kun gyis shes so// denas com
190b2: ldan 'das la blo gros mi zad pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyar ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug la chos kyi dgab bskum pa ga
190b3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rigs kyi bu de'i dus la ba par shes na byin cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi zad pas bdag gi mthul nas brgya stong ri pa'i
190b4: gi do shal bkrol nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la chos kyi dgab par byin te/ skyes bu dam pa bdag las chos kyi dgab pa 'di long shig/ dem blangs nas de das
190b5: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi zad pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis mu tig gi
190b6: shal 'di bdag la snying brtse ba'i phyir long shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tho gros mi zad pam
190b7: snying brtse ba dang / 'khor bzhi po de dag dang lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang na mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang sti 'phye chen po dang ma dang mi ma yin pa la snying brtse ba'i phyir byang chub sems ca
190b8: sems dpa' pa thogs mi zad pa las mu tig gi gal blangs so/ / blangs nas cha gnyis su thags te/ bags nas cha cig na bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phul lo// chag cig na de bzhin gagags
191a1: pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mang gi rin po che'i mchod rten la phul lo/ / rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'jig
191a2: rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di nas / de lta bu'i rnam par 'phrul pas rnam par rgyu'o// de la de'i chos nyid ni 'di skad ces bya'o// rgyal mtshan khra bos blo gros mi zad la// de yi don gyi rgyu ni kun dris pa// rgyal ba'i sras
191a3: po 'di ltar ci yi phyir/ / spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po zhes 'di bgyi// de nas de yis phyogs rnams kun bltas te// smon lam rgya mtsho blo gros mi zad pas// rgyal mtshan khra bo de la 'di skad smras// spyan ras gzigs
191a4: kyi dbang po'i spyod pa nyon/ / bskal pa bsam yas bye ba du ma brgyar// sangs rgyas stong phrag bye ba mang po la// smon lam ji ltar rab tu rnam par sbyangs// de dag kho bos rab tu bshad kyis nyon// mnyan par byed cing
191a5: lta bar byed pa dang / / rims kyis de ltar rjes su dran pa yang // srog chags rnams ni 'bras bu yod par 'gyur// sdug bsngal dang ni mya ngan thams cad sol// gal te gsod pas me yi dong du yang // bsad par bya
191a6: ba'i phyir ni bor ba'i mis/ / spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dran na ni// chus btab bzhin du me dag zhi bar 'gyur// rgya mtsho dang ni mya ngan rgal na yang // klu dang 'byung po lha ma yin gnas su// spyan ras gzigs kyi
191a7: dbang po dran na ni/ / chu yi na na nam yang mi nub bo// rab tu sdang ba'i yid kyis bsad pa'i phyir// ri rab lhun po'i rtse nas bor na yang // spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dran na ni// nyi ma lta bur namamakhar gnas par
191a8: 'bru / / gal te rdo rje yi ni ri dag kyang // bsad pa'i phyir ni spyi bor 'ongs na yang // spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dran na ni// ba spu'i khud tsam brtseg par mi nus so// bsad pa'i sems kyis lag na mtshon thogs te/
191b1: dgra tshogs mang pos kun tu bskor na yang // spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dran na ni// de ma thag tu byams pa'i sems su 'gyur// gal te bsod pa nye bar 'ongs nas su// gshed ma mi yi dbang du gyur na yang /
191b2: spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dran na ni// de yi mtshan cha dum bu dum bur 'gyur// deste shing ngam lcags las byas pa yi// khong sgril dang ni gdos kyis bcings na yang // spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dran na ni//
191b3: bcings pa myur du rnam par bcad par 'gyur// sngags dang stobs dang sman dang rig sngags dang // ro langs pa dang 'byung po lus 'jigs pa// spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dran na ni// gang nas rab tu btang ba de
191b4: slar 'gro/ / gnod sbyin lha min 'byung po klu 'bar ba// mdangs 'phrog pa yis yongs su bskor na yang // spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dran na ni// ba spu'i khung tsam gtses par yod mi nus// mche bsen non rab tu 'jigs
191b5: pa yi/ / gcan zan ma rungs pa yis bskor na yang // spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dran na ni// myur bar phyogs kun du yang 'gro bar 'gyur// mig 'jigs me lce lta bur 'od 'phro ba// mig dug can gyis
191b6: yongs su bskor na yang / / spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dran na ni// shin du myur bar gdug pa med par 'gyur// bzang po'i klog kyang 'byung zhing sdug pa yi// sprin las lce dang ser ba char 'bab pa//
191b7: spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dran na ni// de ma thag tu myur bar rab tu zhi// sdug bsngal mang po brgya yis gtses pa dang // sdug bsngal mang pos gzir ba'i sems can mthong // ye shes dge ba'i stobs
191b8: kyis spyan ras gzigs/ / de bas lha bcas 'gro ba skyob pa'o// rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis pha rol song ba ste// thabs dang ye shes yangs pa bslabs pas na// phyogs bcu'i 'gro ba mang po thams cad dang // ma lus
192a1: zhing kun du yang rab tu snang / / srog chags rnams kyi ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa dang // mi khom pa dang sems can dmyal ba dang // byol song dang ni gshin rjes bskor ba yang // skye rgan pas gzir ba mthar zhi byed//
192a2: shin du dge ba'i spyan de byams pa'i spyan// thabs dang shes rab khyad par yod pa'i spyan// snying rje'i spyan dang byams pa'i spyan pas na// zhal bzang spyan bzang shin tu lta 'dod pa// dri ma med pa dri ma bral ba'i 'od /
192a3: rab rab med pa ye shes nyi ma'i 'od// sprin gyis chod par gyur pa med pa'i 'od// 'jig rten dag na lhag ge lhang der mdzes// snying rje las byung tshul khrims grags pa ste// dge ba'i yon tan byams yid sprin chen po//
192a4: srog chags rnams kyi nyon mongs me'i byed// chos kyi char pa bdud rtsi rab tu 'bebs// thab mo dang ni rtsod cing 'gyed pa yi// 'jigs chen g.yul dor skyes bu song na yang // spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dran na ni// dem
192a5: thag tu dgra rnams rab tu zhi/ / sprin gyi sgra dang rnga bo che yi sgra// 'brug gi sgra dang tshangs pa'i dbyangs snyan pa// dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor pha rol phyin pa ste// spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dran par bya// dag pa'i sems dpa
192a6: spyan ras gzigs dbang po/ / the tshom maza dran byos dran par gyis// 'chi ba'i tshe dang nyon mongs gtses pa'i tshe// mgon dang skyabs dang dpung gnyen du yang 'gyur// yon tan thams cad kyi ni pha rol phyin// sems can
192a7: kun la snying rje byams pa'i spyan/ / yang dag yon tan yon tan rgya mtsho che// spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po phyag byar 'os// 'di ltar 'gro ba rnams la snying brtse ba// phyi ma'i dus na sangs rgyas su yang 'gyur// 'jigs dang
192a8: mya ngan thams cad 'jig byed pa/ / spyan ras gzigs dbang de ni dran par bya// 'jig rten dbang gi rgyal po gtso bo ste// dge slong chos kyi 'byung gnas 'jig rten mchod// bskal pa brgya phrag mang po spyad nas su/
192b1: rdul bral blan med pa'i byang chub 'thob// 'dren pa snang ba mtha' yas g.yas g.yon nas// bsel yab thogs te de bzhin g.yab cing 'jug/ zlum la bu'i ting ngange 'dzin gyis kyang // zhi rnams kun dri song nas rgyal ba
192b2: mchod/ / nub kyi phyogs na bde ba'i 'byung gnas te// rdul bral 'jig rten khams 'di bde ba can// de na sems can kha lo sgyur ba yi// 'dren pa che mtha' yas pa 'di da ltar bzhugs// der ni bud med rnams kyang mi
192b3: 'byung ste/ / rnam pa kun du g.yes pa'i chos med do// rgyal ba'i sras po de dag rngus te skye// dri ma med pa pad ma'i snying pora'i dug/ 'dren pa tshe mtha' yas pa de nyid kyang // pad ma'i snying po dri med dga' ba la// seng go/
192b4: khri la rab tu bzhugs pa yang // sa la'i rgyal po lta bur rnam par mdzes// 'jig rten 'dren pa 'di yang de bzhin te// srid pa gsum na de yang yod med do// gang gis spyan ras gzigs dbang ming thos pa// de yi bsod
192b5: nams dag ni mi zad 'gyur/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa 'dzin stan las langs te// bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das
192b6: ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba bdud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das su dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi le'u// byang chub
192b7: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rnam par 'phrul pa bstan pa kun n+da na'i lel/ / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rnam par sprul pa'i tshe 'phrul 'di thos pa'i sems can de dang ni //
192b8: ba'i rtsa ba ngan don dang ldan pa ma lags so// kun nas bsgo'i le'u bstan pa 'di bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa na/ 'khor de las srog chags brgyad khro bzhi stong gis mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa/ bla na med
193a1: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ro/ / dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po las/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rnam par 'phrul pa bstan pa kun nas sgo'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o//
193a2: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa grangs med par gyur pa de'i
193a3: tshe de'i dus na/ bskal pa thong na dga' ba la 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang ba'i 'od zer gyis brgyan par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa
193a4: bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun du rgyas
193a5: pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo / / de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra dbyings snyan sbar pa'i rgyal po me tog kun du rgyas pa de'i gsung rab la/ rgyal po dge ba bkod pa zhes bya ba byung ste/ rigs kyi bu dag rgyal po
193a6: dge ba bkod pa de'i chung ma dri ma med pas byin pa zhes bya ba zhig yod do/ / rigs kyi bu dag rgyal po dge ba bkod pa de la bu gnyis shig yod de/ gcig gi ming ni dri ma med pa'i snying po/ gcig gi ming ni dri ma med
193a7: pa'i mig ste/ khye'u de gnyis rdzu 'phrul dang ldan shes rab dang ldan bsod nams dang ldan ye shes dang ldan te/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la brtson par gyur to// 'di lta ste sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
193a8: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa'i pha
193b1: rol tu phyin pa dang thams pa dang snying rje dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms dang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun po dag la brtson par gyur te/ / thams cad kyi pha rol tu son par gyur to// dri ma med pa'i ting nge
193b2: 'dzin gyi pha rol tu song ngo / / rgyu skar dang skar ma dang nyi ma'i ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu song ngo // dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu sod do// dri ma med pa'i 'od gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu
